overview: Archer has over 20 years of experience leading and working within sales organizations to provide complex technology solutions with a primary focus on mobile telephony. Prior to joining Ortiva, Archer served in senior sales and sales management roles at TTI Telecom, Cash-U Mobile Technologies, Viziqor, and most recently, Flash Networks. Archerâ€™s recent challenges also include more than a decade of work in Mobile Telephony around the globe in the field of Operational Support Systems (OSS) and Revenue Assurance. Archer studied music at the University of British Columbia and Business Administration at Capilano University.
